    • Method Detail

      • findVisiblePaymentPlans

        public static IQueryBeanResult<PaymentPlan> findVisiblePaymentPlans()
        This method is used to retrieve all PaymentPlans in the system that have UserVisible = true. (ie: filter out all the internal PaymentPlans which are used only within PlcyBillingInstruction when PaymentPlanModifiers exist, and return only those PaymentPlans which should actually be visible in the UI)
        Returns:
        IQueryBeanResult obtained from a query that finds all PaymentPlan entities in the system that have PaymentPlan.UserVisible = TRUE

      • findVisiblePaymentPlans

        public static IQueryBeanResult<PaymentPlan> findVisiblePaymentPlans(@Nonnull
                                                    Currency currency)
        This method is used to retrieve all PaymentPlans in the system that have UserVisible = true. It is additionally limited to the passed in currency.
        Parameters:
        currency - the results will be limited to payment plans in this currency
        Returns:
        IQueryBeanResult obtained from a query that finds all PaymentPlan entities in the system that have PaymentPlan.UserVisible = TRUE

      • findPaymentPlan

        public static PaymentPlan findPaymentPlan(java.lang.String paymentPlanName)
        Retrieve a PaymentPlan with a specified name
        Parameters:
        paymentPlanName - name of a PaymentPlan to be found
        Returns:
        PaymentPlan instance that has a name matching the one that was passed into this method

      • findEligibleVisiblePaymentPlansForPolicyPeriod

        public static IQueryBeanResult<PaymentPlan> findEligibleVisiblePaymentPlansForPolicyPeriod(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod)
        Parameters:
        policyPeriod - the policy period whose eligible payment plans to find
        Returns:
        IQueryBeanResult obtained from a query that finds all PaymentPlan entities that have PaymentPlan.UserVisible = TRUE If the policy period is list bill, limit the results to those associated with the overriding payer account, if one exists

      • findVisiblePaymentPlansOnAccount

        public static IQueryBeanResult<PaymentPlan> findVisiblePaymentPlansOnAccount(Account account)
        Parameters:
        account - the account whose visible payment plans to find
        Returns:
        IQueryBeanResult obtained from a query that finds all PaymentPlan entities that have PaymentPlan.UserVisible = TRUE limit the results to those associated with the account,
